flawed_nl_solution:
35% of the cookies have nuts and chocolate chips because 100 - 25 - 40 = <<100-25-40=35>>35
60% of the cookies have nuts in them because 25 + 35 = <<25+35=60>>60
She makes 63 cookies with nuts in them because 60 x 0.6 =<<63=63>>63
She needs 126 nuts because 63 x 2 = <<63*2=126>>126
#### 126

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36, not 63. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
